data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 565,800 citizens of the the state of Kärnten.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the state of Kärnten to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.section_summary: On average, 63 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Kärnten, Austria.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Father, please give the church in the state of Kärnten prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 3,225 believers find a person of peace today among the 562,576 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Bosniak people.
Jesus, please give your people in Kärnten, Austria a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Kärnten, Austria.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.section_summary:
the state of Kärnten, Austria has a population of 565,800.

We estimate Kärnten has 3,225 people who might know Jesus, 379,970 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 182,606 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 175 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, convict the 3,225 believers in Kärnten to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
